name: Army of the Emerald
description:
A dryad has been dreaming of the end of the world. Some cosmic terror threatens the surface world and the underground may be the only refuge from the future. She recruits a samurai and a priestess to guide her to an ancient dwarven tomb where she hopes to create a colony of survivors and bunker down to survive the apocalypse.

This game was made for the RPG Maker MZ Touch the Stars jam. It was great to have a month-long project and if it is well received by players I will keep it going. I hope you enjoy this JRPG short story!
